channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Innovs HR
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Innovs HR

item.title: CVE-2024-0858|2024-03-18T19:05:49.195Z -- Unknown -- Innovs HR
item.description: The Innovs HR WordPress plugin through 1.0.3.4 does not have CSRF checks in some places, which could allow attackers to make logged in users perform unwanted actions via CSRF attacks such as adding them as employees.
